  • City Secretary / HR Director
Whether you have moved from a neighboring city or from another state, you must be a registered voter in order to vote in the City of Shavano Park. Register to Vote by visiting VoteTexas.gov There are three precincts within the City of Shavano Park - Precinct 3075, 3176, and 3196. The City of Shavano Park City Council election is held on the first Saturday in May of each year. This year election day is May 2, 2026 for the City of Shavano Park, Texas. The May 2, 2026 General Election in the City of Shavano Park, Texas is for the purpose of electing three (3) Aldermen. Una Elección General en la Ciudad de Shavano Park, Texas con el propósito de elegir tres Concejales

Shavano Park Early Election and Election Day Vote Center Location: Shavano Park City Hall 900 Saddletree Court , Shavano Park, Texas 78231 For more information about the City's election, visit LINK .
